tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE elected_officials (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    position TEXT NOT NULL,
    government_level TEXT NOT NULL,
    contact_info JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE elected_officials (
	elected_official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	level_of_office VARCHAR(50),
	contact_info VARCHAR(100)
);
CREATE TABLE elected_officials (official_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), position VARCHAR(50), contact_number VARCHAR(15));
CREATE TABLE federal_officials (official_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), position VARCHAR(50), contact_email VARCHAR(50), state VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE state_officials (official_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), position VARCHAR(50), contact_address VARCHAR(100), state VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE local_officials (official_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), position VARCHAR(50), contact_number VARCHAR(15), city VARCHAR(50));
CREATE TABLE contact_info_categories (category_id INT PRIMARY KEY, category_name VARCHAR(50));
